cab.content: MINISTRY OF SHIPPING MEMORANDUM FOR THE WAR CABINETSHIPBUILDING.The Shipping Controller received on the 11th October, Admiralty Memorandum for the War Cabinet - G.T.7959, the date of which he observes to be 11th August.The Shipping Controller fails to see in what respect his memorandum of August 5th can be said to have misrepresented the position in any way. The only statements contained therein were made on information furnished by the Admiralty and are not questioned in the First Lord's note.The Admiralty in no way consulted the Shipping Controller before sending out their Memorandum G.T.7959.13th October, 1919.
